original_title: Ex-senior health official arrested over immunoglobulin scandal
original_body_lines: The former Deputy Director of Health Services, Herath Kumara has been arrested by the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) over the substandard human immunoglobulin scandal.
The arrest was made at the Health Ministry premises this afternoon (Jan.05).
He will be produced before the Maligakanda Magistrate’s Court later today.
